citations.narrative:
Acquisition records are missing for 4 cats ( ID : 184 - 187 ) that are present at at the vet tech building at time of the
inspection . Records for the other cats and dogs are present however these 4 were omitted on the record. Acquistion
records are important if an animal must be traced to its origin and to verify it was obtained from a source compliant with
the Animal Welfare Act. The record must contain the name and address of the person from whom a dog or cat was
purchased or otherwise acquired.
CORRECT BY : 9/28/23
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
n

narrative:
2.35(b)(1) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
Acquisition records are missing for 4 cats ( ID : 184 - 187 ) that are present at at the vet tech building at time of the 
inspection . Records for the other cats and dogs are present however these 4 were omitted on the record. Acquistion 
records are important if an animal must be traced to its origin and to verify it was obtained from a source compliant with 
the Animal Welfare Act. The record must contain the name and address of the person from whom a dog or cat was 
purchased or otherwise acquired.  
CORRECT BY : 9/28/23 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
